DataElement.preferredName: Definitive Treatment Delay Neoadjuvant Therapy Toxicity Attribution Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indication whether definitive therapy delay was attributed to neoadjuvant therapy toxicity.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Definitive Treatment Delay Neoadjuvant Therapy Toxicity Attribution
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The treatment plan for a disease or disorder that has been chosen as the best one for a patient after all other choices have been considered._Time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time; the state of being slower or later._The administration of therapeutic agents prior to the primary treatment for the purpose of making the primary treatment more effective._The finding of bodily harm due to the poisonous effects of something._To assign to a cause or source.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The treatment plan for a disease or disorder that has been chosen as the best one for a patient after all other choices have been considered.:Time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time; the state of being slower or later.

Concepts.definition: The treatment plan for a disease or disorder that has been chosen as the best one for a patient after all other choices have been considered.
Time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time; the state of being slower or later.

Property.preferredDefinition: The administration of therapeutic agents prior to the primary treatment for the purpose of making the primary treatment more effective.:The finding of bodily harm due to the poisonous effects of something.:To assign to a cause or source.

Concepts.definition: Therapy administered prior to the primary treatment for the purpose of making the primary treatment more effective.
The finding of bodily harm due to the poisonous effects of something.
To assign to a cause or source.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
